bibl.title: All Iberia is Divided into Two Parts.
bibl.note: P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). Examines and answers the arguments by which Canfora's theses about column IV are supported.

bibl.title: Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008)

bibl.seg: WEST Martin, All Iberia is Divided into Two Parts.

Kai BRODERSEN and Jaś ELSNER (Edd.), Images and Texts on the "Artemidorus Papyrus". Working Papers on P. Artemid. (St. John's College Oxford, 2008) = Historia. Einzelschriften. 214 (Stuttgart, 2009) pp. 95-101.
P. Artemid. (= M.-P.3 168.02; LDAB 7132). Examines and answers the arguments by which Canfora's theses about column IV are supported.
